synopsis.text: English ships ravage a Japanese town during the Bakumatsu period, leaving a samurai's son orphaned and filled with vengeance. The boy, now named Ryo, embarks on a journey to become a skilled swordsman, eventually capturing the attention of Ryoma Sakamoto, a visionary samurai determined to bring change to Japan. As Ryo becomes Ryoma's bodyguard, they traverse the country together with Ryoma's wife, Oryuu, fighting for a brighter future. This powerful tale is one of the four films from Anime Mirai 2013, a project backed by the Japanese government to support the training of young animators.
